page.title: 16A Day In The Life of MRS P.
page.content: A typical day in the life of a housewife. I get up at 7.00am,I shower and wash my hair using vosene shampoo and Imperial Leather soap.I dress,usually in a dress and cardigan.Next I go down to prepare breakfast.We usually have cereal and toast.I prepare sandwiches for my son and husband.The rest of the family have left by 8.15am, which is when I begin my housework. I have lunch at 1.00pm,normally a sandwich and fruit.While I am eating this I watch a magazine programme on television.During the afternoon I walk the dog. When the family come home I prepare their meals.My favourite meal is an Indian curry. In the evening I watch television and knit or read.I eventually retire at about 10.30pm.
